what.lead: Grow the green economy, by introducing an EU-wide carbon tax
what.text: and other forms of carbon pricing along the entire production chain and by ending subsidies on fossil-based fuel. The funds gained will be used for relevant climate mitigation and adaptation projects and to create new jobs.

what.lead: Use energy in a smarter way,
what.text: by introducing smart electricity grids, by setting more ambitious energy-saving targets, and by creating incentives for green and low-energy public transportation.
